name: Three Wizards In A Trenchcoat
description:
Made with GameMaker

Swap through your massive stack of adventureres to take out the stacks of enemies in this turn based strategy game

Controls

MoveWASD or Arrow Keys

Use your mouse to interact with everythin else

Check out the book icon on the main menu for the in-game how to play (Does not work on HTML5 Target for some reason, so hopefully it being here helps)

Made for Kenny Jam 2022 with the theme "Growth"

Credits:

  • Song: Lighthearted Loop by IsharaComix
  • Art and Audio: Kenny Assets
  • Font: OpenDyslexic
  • Code: HOPL

Kenny Assets Used:

  • Tiny Dungeon for all characters, weapon symbols, and monster spawner
  • Scribble Dungeon for background tiles
  • UI Pack, UI Pack: RPG Expansion, Game Icons, and  Board Game Icons for the UI
